title: Textile, 1865
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Commemorative fabric celebrating the race horse, Gladiateur who won both the Epsom and the Grand Prix in 1865. These facts and the horse's lineage is on the fabric. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1865.
1865. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-209.
